item.title: DAO Index updated to Version 0.9 and the release of the Alpha version of Moyo
item.description:
DAO Index updated to Version 0.9 and the release of the Alpha version of Moyo # Charles Adjovu May 4
Photo by Dan Dimmock on Unsplash The DAO Index has been updated to Version 0.9. You can read about the update here. The alpha version of Moyo (formerly known as Laplace) has also been released. Please take a look here.
